name: Mimosa

ingredients.name: freshly squeezed orange juice
ingredients.original_string: 2 ounces freshly squeezed orange juice, strained (blood oranges, clementines or whatever you have on hand also work)

ingredients.name: orange liqueur, such as cointreau
ingredients.original_string: Orange liqueur, such as Cointreau or Grand Marnier (optional)

instructions: Pour juice into a Champagne flute, top with sparkling wine. Garnish with a sprig of mint if you like. If youâ€™re after a stronger drink, add a teaspoon of orange liqueur, after the sparkling wine.
